name: pacs_1
question: How often have you thought about drinking or about how good a drink would make you feel?
value_0: Never—0 times during this period of time
value_1: Rarely—1 to 2 times during this period of time
value_2: Occasionally—3 to 4 times during this period of time
value_3: o Sometimes—5 to 10 times during this period of time  (4)
value_4: Often—11 to 20 times during this period of time
value_5: Most of the time—20 to 40 times during this period of time
value_6: Nearly all of the time—more than 40 times or more than 6 times per day

value_3: o Sometimes—5 to 10 times during this period of time  (4)

name: das_32
question: Which of the following statements best describes how you feel about the future of your relationship?
value_1: My relationship can never succeed, and there is no more that I can do to keep the relationship going.
value_2: It would be nice if it succeeded, but I refuse to do any more than I am doing now to keep the relationship going.
value_3: It would be nice if my relationship succeeded, but I can’t do much more than I am doing now to help it succeed.
value_4: I want very much for my relationship to succeed, and will do my fair share to see that it does.
value_5: I want very much for my relationship to succeed, and will do all I can to see that it does.
value_6: I want desperately for my relationship to succeed, and would go to almost any length to see that it does.
